high_descs: Cross the room to the left and stand in front of the tub.
Pick the purple cloth up that is second from the left in the tub.
Turn around and face the toilet.
Put the cloth on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Put a cloth on the back of a toilet.

high_descs: Turn left and go forward to the tub.
Pick up the rag from the tub, the one second to the right.
Turn left and go forward to the wall, then turn left to face the toilet.
Put the rag on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Put a rag on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Put the rag on the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Put the rag on the toilet.
